items.title: Three things that could make a Gaza hostage deal more likely
items.description: There is fresh anticipation about the talks after several shifts, both politically and on the ground.

items.title: Maps and pictures chart how fires have spread
items.description: Maps and images showing how the fires currently affecting the Los Angeles area are developing.

items.title: German-Iranian woman Nahid Taghavi released from prison in Tehran
items.description: Taghavi, 70, spent more than four years in jail after a trial that rights groups said was grossly unfair.

items.title: 'I can't believe my baby is not going to be here' - mother of fire victim
items.description: Shelley Sykes' son Rory, who had cerebral palsy and struggled with mobility, chose not to follow an evacuation order.

items.title: Oliviero Toscani, Benetton's shock photographer, dies aged 82
items.description: Toscani was the creative force behind shock ad campaigns of the 1990s including a priest and nun kissing.
